Method:
-------

1. Disconnect from the Internet, or block all traffic with your firewall.

2. Extract "RadioSure.exe" into your "C:\Program Files" folder

3. Open your Hosts file (C:\Windows\System32\DriversetcHosts) AS ADMINISTRATOR

4. Add this to the end of the file, minus quotes "127.0.0.1 www.radiosure.com"

5. Run RadioSure\RadioSurePortable.exe

6. In Options -> General: Disable update checks.

7. Right Click the title bar and select "About"

8. Register with this RETAiL key:

Sm9obmF0aGFuIFN0YWdob3JuIChqb2huYXRoYW4uc3RhZ2hvcm5AeWFob28uY28udWspOjo6OkU5NDUtN1YzRy1KUVBQLUxLSFQtU1NHMi1BNlpXLUpIVEctU1pUNy1NUVRGLUVYNzUtRjlaMi1GVUJVLUpXNUctNEhNMi1MSlk4LU5ZWlktUFQyQi01RkRZLTZKS0gtRlo1RU5F

9. go to http://www.radiosure.com/stations/ and download latest stations, copy into your RadionSureAppRadioSureStations folder


Radio Stations will not automatically update so you will need to repeat step #9 if you want your radio stations updated
Remember to delete the old stations file "stations-2013-10-11.rsd"


If you can't or don't know how to edit your hosts file then just right click the hosts.bat file and Run as Administrator
this will add the entry for you


Enjoy

//KiwiPirate
